name: @sergdudko/objectstream
description: Creates a stream to convert json from string or convert json to string.

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && npm run build:cjs-package
scripts.update: eval "$(node -e 'const t = require(`./package.json`);const ignore = require(`./ignoreUpdatesModules.json`);console.log(`npm i ${(Object.keys(t.dependencies || {}).filter((e)=>ignore.base.indexOf(e) === -1).map((e)=>(`${e}@latest`)).join(` `))} --save&&npm i ${(Object.keys(t.devDependencies || {}).filter((e)=>ignore.dev.indexOf(e) === -1).map((e)=>(`${e}@latest`)).join(` `))} --save-dev`);')"
scripts.testv12: docker run --name=objectstream-node12 --rm -v $PWD:/app node12:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv13: docker run --name=objectstream-node13 --rm -v $PWD:/app node13:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv14: docker run --name=objectstream-node14 --rm -v $PWD:/app node14:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv16: docker run --name=objectstream-node16 --rm -v $PWD:/app node16:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv18: docker run --name=objectstream-node18 --rm -v $PWD:/app node18:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
scripts.testv20: docker run --name=objectstream-node20 --rm -v $PWD:/app node20:1.0.0 nyc npm run test
